name: Chocolate Cake
longDescription: A deliciously moist chocolate cake made with premium cocoa and layered with creamy chocolate frosting. Perfect for dessert lovers seeking deep flavor.

name: Baklava
longDescription: Authentic Middle Eastern baklava made with thin layers of phyllo dough, filled with crushed pistachios and walnuts, and soaked in aromatic syrup.

name: Cheesecake
longDescription: A smooth and creamy New York-style cheesecake with a buttery biscuit crust and a subtle vanilla flavor. Served chilled for the perfect finish.

name: Donuts
longDescription: Soft and fluffy donuts freshly made every day. Comes in a variety of glazes and toppings, perfect for a quick sweet snack or with coffee.
